<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/google-search-console/sites"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



List all of sites from the authenticated google search console in account.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Filters the list to include only site URLs that are equal to or related to the given site URL, including its parent or base URLs.","in":"query","name":"relatedSiteUrl","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"A Website","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","description":"The Website URL, it may also start with thew `sc-domain:` prefix."}},"required":["url"],"title":"Website"}}}},"description":"List of GSC sites"},"401":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"A Website","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","description":"The Website URL, it may also start with thew `sc-domain:` prefix."}},"required":["url"],"title":"Website"}}}},"description":"Unauthorized"},"412":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"A Website","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","description":"The Website URL, it may also start with thew `sc-domain:` prefix."}},"required":["url"],"title":"Website"}}}},"description":"When the account is not connected to any Google Search Console"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
